Docs.summary: Represents user login information for forms authentication by using client application services.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The ClientFormsAuthenticationCredentials class is used by the <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.IClientFormsAuthenticationCredentialsProvider> interface. When you implement this interface, you must return a populated instance of this class in your <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.IClientFormsAuthenticationCredentialsProvider.GetCredentials%2A> implementation.
## Examples The following example code demonstrates how to implement the <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.IClientFormsAuthenticationCredentialsProvider.GetCredentials%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method, which returns an instance of this class. In this example, the <xref:System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.IClientFormsAuthenticationCredentialsProvider.GetCredentials%2A> method is part of a login dialog box class. The method displays the dialog box, and then returns a ClientFormsAuthenticationCredentials instance initialized with the user-specified values.
